caseTitle: Action on the news clipping published in Daily Pakistan dated 17.04.2013
tagline: The case, in view of the statement of Attorney General regarding the request of Federal Government to the regulator (NEPRA) for reconsideration of determination of tariff of DISCOs and KESC, is adjourned for further hearing on the issues involved in the petition and also to ascertain the outcome of the policy statement/decision of the Government.
